title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the report parameter settings. 2. Set a default value in the list box. 3. Modify the default value. 4. Observe that the modified default value is not retained.
OB: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter should be retained after modifying the default value.
SR:
1. Open the report parameter settings.
2. Set a default value in the list box.
3. Modify the default value.
4. Observe that the modified default value is retained.
